title: Type ID : Moleskine note book Font ?
content:
Does anybody know what the Font used on Moleskine note books is?

What font is the following text set in?

"For the Legendary notebook of Hemmingway, Picasso, Chatwin"

Many Thanks to anyone who can identify it.

Ash

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130411234338im_/http:/typophile.com/files/moleskine_5386.jpg)
author: Ashleyco
